data.why:
Class::Modular -- A per object (as opposed to per-class)
    inheritance module.
    [http://rzlab.ucr.edu/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Class+Modular]

    Reference:: (will _not_ be uploaded to CPAN until a better
    namespace is located) -- routines to deal with retrieving references
    from online databases w/ searching and outputing the resultant
    references in multiple different formats, including bibtex.
    [http://rzlab.ucr.edu/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/trunk/lib/?root=Reference]

    Plus a few other modules that are currently incubating in my
    cvs|svn repositories.
